name: Wild Cryobino
text:
This monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. If this card is sent to the GY: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. Once per turn: You can pay 500 LP; add 1 "Cryobino" monster from your Deck to your hand. This card must be in the GY to activate and to resolve this effect.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
